xxl.core.xml.storage
Class ProxyNode

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.xml.storage.Node
      xxl.core.xml.storage.ProxyNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class ProxyNode
extends Node

This class is an extention of the abstract class Node. It is used to distribute large trees over different records. An proxy node can have child nodes, and can standalone.

Field Summary
protected  Object childId
          Identifyer which is used to find the subtree below.
